version.change: fromJSON now uses libjson for the native parsing and a C routine to transform the resulting tree into R. This leads to a considerable speedup in parsing documents, approximately a factor of 200 over the customizable, event driven mechanism in earlier versions and still available in this package via the basicJSONHandler function and fromJSON.
Refinement of handling large integers that do not fit into a 4 byte int. Tested on Windows.
Handle large integers that do not fit into a 4 byte int. Return as numeric values.

changelog.version: Convert factors to character vectors in toJSON and then serialize.

version.change: Handles UTF-8 content as input. We convert the text to raw and then integer values.
(Minor) Change to the C code to make it compile on Windows.

Scalar, by default, values are represented in JSON as scalars and not arrays of length 1. One can control this via the container parameter in toJSON.
